 6 -def parseManifest(lines): 

 7      cases = [] 
 8      for line in lines: 
 9          if line.startswith('#') or not line.strip(): 
10              continue 
11   
12          # remove newline 
13          assert line[-1] == '\n' 
14          line = line[:-1] 
15   
16          # split fields 
17          parts = line.split('\t') 
18          assert len(parts) == 3 
19   
20          cases.append(tuple(parts)) 
21   
22      return cases
